name: Umber
description:
What would you do if your home got invaded by an evil and dark force?
Get rid of it!
Help Umber to collect the light of the forest and destroy the dark.
You may encounter some friendly companions along your way.

Controls

"Umber" is designed for the Windows PC and can be controlled with keyboard and controller.

Installation Guide

1. Download ZIP file     
2. Right click and select "Extract All...".
 3. Save the file in a safe spot  
4. Start the .exe   
5. Have fun playing!
